content:
Enter WebDAV

  • WebDAV makes the Web a writeable, collaborative medium by supporting:

    • Remote editing: software development artifacts can be modified from anywhere in the world
    • Collaboration: can work on artifacts with other people without losing changes
    • Namespace management: copy and move operations support maintenance of the names of software development artifacts
    • Metadata: properties allow information about artifacts to be stored with, but separate to the artifact
